content: question about the new globus config .. we have current config running on our QA site with v6.0 .. for the new config the doc says ".. the Globus-related functionality in the UI will only function correctly if a Dataverse 6.1 compatible version of the dataverse-globus app is configured." .. where can i find the dataverse 6.1 version of the app? The code here looks the same, so does that just mean I need to reconfigure the dataverse options? (ie: can i use the dataverse-globus code that we already have installed?) Also, does anything need to change in our S3 globus app/guest collection? I understand i will need to change the dataverse config to use a globus store now instead of the original db options but trying to sift through what other changes I will need to make.
ah maybe it is the update_16 branch?
Hmm, yes, https://github.com/scholarsportal/dataverse-globus/tree/update_16 is the most up-to-date branch. Dunno. Maybe you could reach out to Victoria (lubitchv)? Or open an issue in that repo?
okay yea will try an issue in the repo
